sentences.pinyin: tā bùxiǎoxīn zhuàng dào le zhuōzi
sentences.translation: He accidentally knocked against the table.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他正在开车的时候，因为没有注意路况，所以撞到了路边的树。
sentences.traditionalText: 他正在開車的時候，因為沒有注意路況，所以撞到了路邊的樹。
sentences.pinyin: tā zhèngzài kāichē de shíhòu, yīnwèi méiyǒu zhùyì lùkuàng, suǒyǐ zhuàng dào le lùbiān de shù
sentences.translation: He knocked against a tree by the side of the road because he didn't pay attention to the road conditions while he was driving.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我在匆忙中不小心撞到了玻璃门，吓得我一个激灵。
sentences.traditionalText: 我在匆忙中不小心撞到了玻璃門，嚇得我一個激靈。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zài cōngmáng zhōng bù xiǎoxīn zhuàng dào le bōlímén, xià de wǒ yīgè jī líng.
sentences.translation: In my hurry, I accidentally ran into the glass door, scaring myself to jump.
